channel.title: How to make an npc face a cerain way?
channel.description:
[br][size=1]Posted on: June 27th, 2002, 12:20:30 PM[/size][hr] :EDIT: Comon ive been waiting YEARS for a post ^^
[code]spawn = 3449 2442 3085 0 3245 3431 3245 3431 1 NPCNAME[/code]
all of my npc's are facing south :S , how do i make then turn a certain way? ive tryed everything in autospawn but that doesnt help.
ALSO:
How do i change how much an item in a shop costs :P?
[code]hop = 1 @whi@Random Stuff 1 1 1931 5 1935 2 1735 2 1925 3 1923 2 1887 2 590 2 1755 2 2347 5 550 5 6070 20 4151 500 3842 500 3844 500 561 500 4675 500 391 5000 397 5000 385 5000 4153 500 [/code]3840 10000 2446 100 7336 1 293 1 6959 100
Sell buy item amount..
the amount is how much of it is in stock...

item.title: How to make an npc face a cerain way?

item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

thank’s and i don’t think you can make npc’s face a different then south.
every server i’ve been on they all faced south.

item.title: How to make an npc face a cerain way?
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

actually it’s called item.cfg… when you go into cfg file right click on items and enter textpad it says… item.cgf.

and that does change shop prices

Read full topic

item.title: How to make an npc face a cerain way?
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

ok open item.cfg.
change the 3 numbers after it tell’s you the description.

exp.

item = 1 Tool_kit These_could_be_handy. 1 1 1

item = 1 Tool_kit These_could_be_handy. 10000 10000 10000

Read full topic
item.source: How to make an npc face a cerain way?
